Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (April 2014 CPU)
Solution:
Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 5, 7 Update 55, 6 Update 75, or 5 Update 65 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an Extended Support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 65 or later or 6 Update 75 or later.

Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 11, 7 Update 65, 6 Update 81, or 5 Update 71 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an extended support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 71 or later or 6 Update 81 or later.

Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (April 2014 CPU)
Solution:
Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 5, 7 Update 55, 6 Update 75, or 5 Update 65 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an Extended Support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 65 or later or 6 Update 75 or later.

Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (April 2014 CPU)
Solution:
Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 5, 7 Update 55, 6 Update 75, or 5 Update 65 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an Extended Support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 65 or later or 6 Update 75 or later.

Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (April 2014 CPU)

Note that an Extended Support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 65 or later or 6 Update 75 or later.

Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (April 2014 CPU)
Solution:
Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 5, 7 Update 55, 6 Update 75, or 5 Update 65 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an Extended Support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 65 or later or 6 Update 75 or later.

Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (July 2014 CPU)
Solution:
Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 11, 7 Update 65, 6 Update 81, or 5 Update 71 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an extended support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 71 or later or 6 Update 81 or later.

Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (April 2014 CPU)
Solution:
Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 5, 7 Update 55, 6 Update 75, or 5 Update 65 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an Extended Support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 65 or later or 6 Update 75 or later.

Note that an extended support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 71 or later or 6 Update 81 or later.

Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (April 2014 CPU)
Solution:
Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 5, 7 Update 55, 6 Update 75, or 5 Update 65 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an Extended Support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 65 or later or 6 Update 75 or later.

Plugin Name: Oracle Java SE Multiple Vulnerabilities (July 2014 CPU)
Solution:
Update to JDK / JRE 8 Update 11, 7 Update 65, 6 Update 81, or 5 Update 71 or later and, if necessary, remove any affected versions.

Note that an extended support contract with Oracle is needed to obtain JDK / JRE 5 Update 71 or later or 6 Update 81 or later.
